name: Sekibanki: Defender of Love
description:
Defend your Gay friends Love by bashing hate faeries!
While Kagerou and Wakasagihime are out on a date evil hate faeries are trying to ruin their love!
you must do the only thing you know how... use your Body and Head to stop them!

Controlled with WASD and mouse!

made for the Touhou Pride Game Jam 2!

all Assest made by Sekibanki
